summary: Juvenile delinquents are sent to a small British island after a fellow prisoner's death, where they have to fight for survival.
cast: Sean Pertwee|Alex Reid|Toby Kebbell|Stephen Wight|Luke Neal|Ben McKay|Lenora Crichlow|Karly Greene|Adam Deacon|Richie Campbell|Stephen Don|John Travers|George Shane|Gordon Fulton|John Rea|Ryan Hendrick|Nathan Hughes|Anthony McKenna|Colin Nicolson
director: Director: M.J. Bassett (as Michael J. Bassett)
title: Wilderness
